metadata.name: Infinite Mineral NÂ°0015
metadata.description:
Infinite Minerals is generative art project expanding on previously exhibited work, exploring a world of undiscovered rocks and minerals.

Each Infinite Mineral is built using a seed system that constantly changes over time, allowing its collector to hold a completely unique artefact that can never be reproduced.

10s MP4 Video, 1280x1280. Higher resolutions available upon request.
